post:
We, Borgos Technologies, are looking for an ideal candidate who welcomes the challenges of acquiring and developing new business through sales efforts . You need to identify the business opportunity and close business deals while maintaining extensive knowledge of current marketing conditions.¬†
*Only candidates from Assam may apply*
Roles & Responsibilities :¬†
1. Responsible for Achieving sales target for self and for the team.¬†
2. Researching organisations and individuals online to identify new leads and potential new market.¬†
3. Develop and implement market strategy targeting the key sectors.¬†
4. Lead generation and meeting creation for the potential business query.¬†
5. Lead all new business sales pitches
6. Should have at least 1 year and above experience in Website/ SEO / Digital agency.¬†
7. Experience with design and implementation of business development strategy
8. Proven ability to negotiate¬†
9. Good communication skills
10. Drive regional ad sales strategy, business development and major accounts management
11. Pitch & cultivate large new accounts in the region
12. Drive annual deals, negotiate and finalize deals across Digital Services
13. To strengthen the company's market position and maximize business performance
14. Building client relationships, negotiating and closing deals
15. Identify key Go-to-Market strategy imperatives resulting from / to enable the evolution of the business
16. Maximize revenue generation
17. Develop business from different avenues

Desired Candidate Profile: 
Bachelor degree Or equivalent experience in Business 1+ year of sales in Digital Agency¬†
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to roll up sleeves and get things done
Relevant higher degree such as an MBA is advantageous but not a requirement
People with Media and publishing/Online website experience preferred

Comment down below or DM me your resume if you are interested. 

#hiringalerts #hiringimmediately #assam #bdejobs

author: https://www.linkedin.com/in/4624518
post:
I joined the #workforce in the late 90s.

Everyone in my generation, on average, had three siblings and joined the workforce(mostly).

Everyone I am employing right now, on average, has two siblings.

Everyone in my generation, on average, has just one child who will be joining the workforce soon.

------------------------------

What does it mean for you if you are an employer?

Hiring a young workforce will become increasingly difficult as the years go by.

You will need to make the best use of your current employee base.

Your workforce will become increasingly older.

If you are lucky enough to have a young workforce, treat them like GOLD.

Invest in their long-term #productivity. 

Invest in their long-term #healthandwellbeing.

------------------------------

If you are just out of college and looking for work, Vantage Circle - Global Employee Engagement Platform would like to hear from you. 

Being a product company, we have positions open in every possible department. 

Please check out our careers section at https://lnkd.in/dz9-m8B and apply accordingly.

#employeeproductivity #employeewellness  #hiring #jobsforfreshers
